content: introducing the woodlands blanket wrap a crochet creation designed for ultimate comfort and style luxuriously oversized and irresistibly cozy this wearable blanket features two spacious front pockets for added functionality elevate your wardrobe with the woodlands blanket wrap complete with a detailed video tutorial to guide you through the creation of this chic yet practical piece this pattern is free on my blog 1 this pattern is available as a kit with lion brand 2 the kit comes with all the yarn needed to make your wrap plus a free copy of the printable pdf download you can even customize your yarn colors i have a full video tutorial available for the woodlands blanket wrap 3 be sure to check it out and subscribe for more free content 1 https //www eandpcrochet com/the-woodlands-blanket-wrap-crochet-pattern/ 2 http //shrsl com/4ffyo 3 https //youtu be/jtwwfzyxrrq
